buttonman.name: Sir Shinay
buttonman.bio: Sir Shinay is a well-respected and well-equipped prince. He likes polishing his armour, long walks on the beach, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Man-At-Arms
buttonman.bio: Man-At-Arms is an alcoholic sailer who happened across some armour at a garage sale. He likes drinking, swearing, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Trogdor
buttonman.bio: Trogdor was a man. He was a dragon man. He likes to beat people up.

buttonman.name: Frodo
buttonman.bio: Swift and kind hearted, Frodo likes butter, the one ring, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Lancet
buttonman.bio: A noble, yet simple, man, Lancet's knighting days are near an end. He likes the Allman Bros., good French cheese, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Sneaky Pete
buttonman.bio: Sneaky Pete tries to use his theving skills only for good. He doesn't always succeed. He likes stealing, punk rock, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Goodgulf
buttonman.bio: A kind wizard, Goodgulf want to use his magic to bring good to the world. He like peace, loose women, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Jovoc
buttonman.bio: A hero in a time of need, Jovoc likes 48 hour game contests, roast beef, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Dumple
buttonman.bio: Dumple the Malevolent is a swarthy warrior. He likes snakes, space battles, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Deepflame
buttonman.bio: Deepflame is a mysterious wanderer. He likes tanks, ping pong, and beating people up.

buttonman.name: Richard
buttonman.bio: Richard is a benevolent ruler. He likes zombies, more zombies and beating people up.
